greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of y divided by the GCD of y to the power of the length of y, where y is the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of a partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 23 2018
